General.Name: Riverview Rubber Estates Bhd
General.Description: Riverview Rubber Estates, Berhad cultivates oil palm in Malaysia. It also invests in properties. The company was incorporated in 1936 and is based in Ulu Kinta, Malaysia. Riverview Rubber Estates, Berhad is a subsidiary of Sungei Ream Holdings Sendirian Berhad.
